name: Zeal
headline: Modern payroll for modern work

founders.name: Pranab Krishnan, Founder
founders.description: Hi! I'm Pranab, founder & CTO of Zeal (formerly Puzzl)--YC S19. Our API helps platforms build/embed payroll. If you're interested in learning more about Zeal, please reach out <pranab@zeal.com>.

founders.name: Kirti Shenoy, Founder
founders.description:
Hi! I'm Kirti, co-founder & CEO of Zeal (YC S19): API-first platform to help companies build payroll products.

If you're interested in learning more about Zeal, please reach out <kirti@zeal.com>.

[Login](https://www.zeal.com/<https:/app.zeal.com/login>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f8c8c036b5359ab85548fa/65fc9a831e9e41422087da5f_button-arrow-white.svg)Get in touch](https://www.zeal.com/</contact-us>)
The Modern Payroll platform
# Automated payroll lets
# Automated payroll lets you do more with less
# Flexible payroll simplifies dynamic work
# Native payroll creates a better worker experience
Zeal is the modern payroll platform that is built to handle modern work. Forget antiquated payroll providers, manual data entry, and bad worker experiences. Automate payroll, taxes, and compliance with our end-to-end, customizable payroll platform.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f8c8c036b5359ab85548fa/65fc9a831e9e41422087da5f_button-arrow-white.svg)Get in touch](https://www.zeal.com/</contact-us>)
![Modern payroll mobile app and admin dashboard](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f8c8c036b5359ab85548fa/663bbcdf67f000dffb818580_home-hero-3.webp)
Trusted by leading employers
![Wonolo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f8c8c036b5359ab85548fa/65fcad06343997803773d495_wonolo_logo_small.webp)
![Qwick logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f8c8c036b5359ab85548fa/65fcad06d0c9d9f9d766924f_qwick_logo_small.webp)
![Lawtrades logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f8c8c036b5359ab85548fa/65fcad06e1a064876dbd6723_lawtrades_logo_big.webp)
![CinemaHive logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f8c8c036b5359ab85548fa/66ccf6554782ed4cd9d55632_logo-ch-color.png)
![Band of Hands logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f8c8c036b5359ab85548fa/65fcad06aba899c1d0515e7e_Band_of_Hands_logo.webp)
![Workgenius logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f8c8c036b5359ab85548fa/65fcad0959cc25ca1adeb76e_workgenius_logo.webp)
## Payroll built for staffing, gig-work, and employers of record
Companies with thousands of workers choose Zeal because we make it simple for them to create a better worker experience while automating payroll, tax, and compliance. No matter how complex the arrangement is.
Group_add
### Staffing
Stop outsourcing or avoiding payroll. Zeal is built for staffing companies to automate payroll and provide a better worker experience.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f8c8c036b5359ab85548fa/65fc9a831e9e41422087da5f_button-arrow-white.svg)Learn more](https://www.zeal.com/</staffing>)
tune
### Gig work
Zeal automates payroll for gig, shift, and freelance work with complex work arrangements. Easily provide payroll with a native, mobile experience.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f8c8c036b5359ab85548fa/65fc9a831e9e41422087da5f_button-arrow-white.svg)Learn more](https://www.zeal.com/</gig-work>)
badge
### EORs and PEOs
Create a better experience for your staff, clients, and workers with a flexible, native, and automated payroll platform built for EORs and PEOs.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f8c8c036b5359ab85548fa/65fc9a831e9e41422087da5f_button-arrow-white.svg)Learn more](https://www.zeal.com/</hr-service-providers>)
## Create a world-class worker experience 
Stop sending your workers to Web 1.0 payroll portals. Build everything your workers need to access payroll right within your own branded experience.
[hubGreater convenienceGive your workers a single place to access their work and payroll. Allow workers to onboard, submit shifts, update information, access information, and more right from within your app.](https://www.zeal.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[CalculateAccurate payMake sure your workers get the right pay, every time. Our flexible platform can handle calculating gross-to-net pay for the most complex work arrangements.](https://www.zeal.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[boltOn-time payMake sure your workers get paid at the right time, every time. Whether you want to pay daily, weekly, or anything else automated payroll means you’ll never miss payday.](https://www.zeal.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)
![Offer greater convenience with native payroll solutions](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f8c8c036b5359ab85548fa/6631465c5f5cf0bbf78ceb21_home-worker-experience-greater-convenience-2.webp)
![Ensure accurate employee payments](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f8c8c036b5359ab85548fa/6631465c437a92ced8800d99_home-worker-experience-gig-work-2.webp)
![Automate payroll to always provide on-time payments](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f8c8c036b5359ab85548fa/6633afa7bf82cfb6472fa55f_home-worker-experience-on-time-pay-3.webp)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f8c8c036b5359ab85548fa/65fc9a831e9e41422087da5f_button-arrow-white.svg)Learn more](https://www.zeal.com/</>)
## Powerful automation for payroll, taxes, and compliance
Leave the data entry to the machines. We enable payroll and compliance automation when workers have unique work arrangements including across multiple companies, locations, complex overtime, and more.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f8c8c036b5359ab85548fa/65fc796e287dc0e7b17c3ce7_button-arrow.svg)Learn more](https://www.zeal.com/<#>)
![Automate worker onboarding](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f8c8c036b5359ab85548fa/663147ee94f7a42a93aed01c_home-seemless-onboarding-1.webp)
### Seamless onboarding
Zeal gives you a simple branded experience to onboard workers. And when workers take on jobs that require more input, you can notify the worker and collect the information without having to lift a finger.
![Automate complex gross-to-net calculations](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f8c8c036b5359ab85548fa/6631480b39d181ee7398b253_home-pinpoint-calculations-1.webp)
### Pinpoint calculations
Gross-to-net calculations get complex with jobs that have varied pay, taxes, states, overtime, deductions, and more. Zeal handles all of the complex calculations so you can run payroll on autopilot.
![Various workforce payment options](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f8c8c036b5359ab85548fa/66273f13f408c72b1c7f7725_home-flexible-payments-1.webp)
### Flexible payments
Our platform gives you and your workers the ability to choose how payments work. Use ACH, downloadable checks, and prepaid checks to pay workers. Fast payments maximize the time that funds sit on your balance sheet.
![Automated payroll, taxes, and compliance](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f8c8c036b5359ab85548fa/66298125a86bdda95a28874e_home-automate-taxes-and-compliance-2.webp)
### Automate taxes and compliance
Our platform automates the most mundane and difficult payroll and compliance activities. Free your payroll admins and make sure data entry doesn’t affect accuracy.
## Get to market quickly and easily
Stop sending your workers to Web 1.0 payroll portals. Build everything your workers need to access payroll right within your own branded experience.
![Offer a native mobile payroll app with no-code](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f8c8c036b5359ab85548fa/663148375e238e2315f05d78_home-launch-worker-app-in-minutes-4.webp)
### Launch a worker app in minutes
Create a fully-functional, branded worker app, in minutes. This is not the same old third-party portal. Onboarding, time tracking, paystubs, tax documents, and everything else payroll related is built into a well designed, modern interface.
![Easily build payroll into your product](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f8c8c036b5359ab85548fa/663148551167558cbab9fd40_home-create-payroll-inside-your-product-2.webp)
### Create payroll inside your product
Complete flexibility and customization is at your fingertips. With our White-label Components and API you can easily build your dream payroll solution into your product. Build custom workflows, integrate with other functionality, and more. Anything is possible.
## Accelerate your business with payroll
Our end-to-end platform is flexible and customizable so you can provide payroll to W-2 and 1099 workers that is tailored to your unique business operations.
savings
#### Lower operational costs
Make the most of your limited resources by automating manual and time consuming payroll and compliance tasks.
cycle
#### Improve worker retention
Workers are the most valuable part of your business. Differentiate yourself with a delightful experience that keeps them working with you.
paid
#### Unlock new revenue
Optimize your flow of funds to keep cash on your balance sheet longer. Provide wallets and paycards to generate net new revenue.
## The platform for enterprise-grade payroll
Build payroll at the speed of startups with the scalability, reliability, security, and compliance that enterprises require.
monitoring
#### Payroll for all your workers
We power payroll at scale for startups and public companies. Build for all of your workers, W2 and 1099, no matter how many. 
star
#### Reliable by default
We support companies with consistently high availability, fast response times, and dedicated communication channels.
verified_user
#### Enterprise-grade security
We’ve built an enterprise-grade platform you can trust. We are SOC 2 compliant and deploy best-in-class practices and tools to maintain security in our infrastructure, product, and company.
verified
#### Compliance built-in
Payroll and tax compliance is built into everything we do. We built a native compliance engine that spans over 11,000 tax jurisdictions that automates compliance activities.
## Get insights and trendsabout modern payroll
Our resources help modern work leaders improve their business
[![The modern payroll platform built for modern work](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660ae6a413b893795a268423/66bfd04b01d1faf8dbb5990f_modernpayrollblog.png)FeaturedCorporateThe modern payroll platform built for modern workWorkers have changed, work has changed, but payroll has not. Until today. We're excited to announce our Series B funding and new products such as Remote I-9 with E-Verify, white-label mobile apps, paycards and wallets, earned wage access, and more.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f8c8c036b5359ab85548fa/65fc9a831e9e41422087da5f_button-arrow-white.svg)Read more](https://www.zeal.com/</blog/the-modern-payroll-platform-built-for-modern-work>)

[![Stay Compliant: Compliance Updates from December 2024](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660ae6a413b893795a268423/678fd1f1c7c48e1364e9788d_Compliance%20Update%20Cover%20-%20December%202024.png)ComplianceStay Compliant: Compliance Updates from December 2024![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f8c8c036b5359ab85548fa/65fc9a831e9e41422087da5f_button-arrow-white.svg)Read more](https://www.zeal.com/</blog/stay-compliant-compliance-updates-from-december-2024>)

## Modernize your payroll with automation, flexibility, and a native worker experience.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Zeal**

Founded in 2019 and based in San Francisco, Zeal is a cutting-edge fintech company that provides a modern payroll solution tailored for contemporary work environments. It emerged from Y Combinator's Summer 2019 (Batch S19), garnering attention for its innovative approach to payroll automation. With a team of 25 dedicated employees, Zeal is on a mission to redefine payroll with the tagline “Modern payroll for modern work,” aiming to streamline and enhance the payroll process for businesses of all sizes.

**Product and Services**

At its core, Zeal's platform simplifies complex payroll needs, especially for staffing, gig work, and employers of record (EORs) by automating payroll, tax compliance, and other time-consuming tasks. Their offerings include:
- **Automated Payroll Processing**: A customizable payroll system that reduces manual data entry and speeds up processes.
- **Mobile Payroll App**: A user-friendly application allowing employees to access payroll information and manage their own data efficiently.
- **Flexible Payment Options**: The system supports various payment methods including ACH transactions, prepaid checks, and wallets, allowing for greater employee satisfaction and financial management.

Zeal focuses on creating a seamless user experience, catering to both businesses and their workforce. They integrate payroll into existing applications, enabling companies to foster a branded and direct link for their employees, which breaks away from outdated payroll portals.

**Market Focus and Strategy**

Targeting the competitive sectors of staffing and gig work, Zeal aims to enhance the worker experience while automating payroll processes. Their platform is especially beneficial for companies with complex employee arrangements, allowing employers to manage a diverse workforce effectively.  This strategic positioning targets both small and large enterprises that require scalable payroll solutions, backed by SOC 2 compliance and robust security measures.

**Recent Developments and Future Goals**

2024 marked a significant year for Zeal, with initiatives that extended beyond traditional payroll functionalities specifically designed for staffing companies. They have ambitious plans to continue evolving their platform, enhancing automation, and integrating new services like earned wage access and white-label mobile apps.

**Team and Leadership**

Led by a team of passionate innovators, Zeal's Group Partner, Michael Seibel from Y Combinator, provides guidance and strategic direction. This mentorship has been instrumental in shaping the company's growth trajectory and product development.

**Conclusion**

With its modern, flexible approach to payroll, Zeal stands at the forefront of the fintech landscape. By addressing the shortcomings of legacy payroll systems, it promises to deliver more efficient, user-friendly solutions that align with the dynamics of today’s workforce. Interested parties can learn more about Zeal and its offerings at [Zeal's official website](https://www.zeal.com).
